Scenario: 1A shell traveling through the air explodes into two fragments of comparable mass.
2A small sounding rocket in deep space separates its payload section from the main body.
3A fragment of space debris traveling in a straight line fractures internally into two non-negligible pieces.
4A large block of ice sliding frictionlessly across a frozen lake explodes into two pieces of similar size.
5A piece of firework traveling directly upwards explodes into two non-identical pieces.
6A heavy nucleus (parent) moving in a straight line undergoes alpha decay into a daughter nucleus and an alpha particle (Piece 1).
7A roller skater skating on a smooth surface throws a heavy gym bag sideways and slightly forward.
8A small submarine cruising horizontally beneath the water launches an underwater exploration drone at an angle upwards and forward.
9A small space-ship cruising in deep space launches an exploration pod at an angle relative to the ship's path.
10A bumper car (on a slick surface, coasting) has its passenger jump out (launching themselves) at an angle.
11A hovercraft moving over a smooth surface pushes (launching) a heavy supply crate at an angle to its direction of travel.
12A heavy sled sliding down a gentle, icy slope launches a dense satellite package sideways.
